text: CLOSE Juan Pablo Galavis has a few thoughts about Arie Luyendyk Jr. ‘ s controversial Bachelor season. Time Becca Kufrin, the ` ` Bachelorette'' for Season 14 of ABC's dating show, says she's engaged. ( Photo : Craig Sjodin / ABC ) Becca Kufrin is a fiancée once more. Less than three months after her break - up with Bachelor Arie Luyendyk Jr. aired, the new Bachelorette revealed she is engaged to People magazine. Good Morning America also announced the news Tuesday. ` ` It was the happiest moment of my life.
